# Ghostty Performance Optimization Config
# Based on: https://ghostty.org/docs/config
# Generated: 2025-11-07

# === Performance Settings ===

# GPU Acceleration (Metal on macOS)
# Ghostty uses Metal for optimal macOS performance

# Rendering Performance
# Maintain smooth scrolling and reduce latency
# Disable cursor blinking to reduce redraws
cursor-style-blink = false

# Memory Management
# Limit scrollback to reduce memory usage
# Default is unlimited, 10k is reasonable
scrollback-limit = 10000

# Visual Effects vs Performance
# Disable heavy visual effects
# Enable window decorations for tabs support
window-decoration = auto

# Disable opacity changes
unfocused-split-opacity = 1.0

# Mouse Performance
# Reduce mouse rendering overhead
mouse-hide-while-typing = true

# === Clipboard Performance ===
clipboard-read = allow
clipboard-write = allow

# Reduce clipboard overhead
clipboard-paste-protection = false

# === Font Rendering ===
# Use system fonts for better performance
# Korean font configuration for MoAI-ADK
font-family = "JetBrains Mono"
font-family = "D2Coding"
font-family = "SF Mono"
font-size = 14
font-feature = "calt"
font-feature = "liga"

# === Window Management ===
# Window state persistence (default/never/always)
window-save-state = default
window-theme = system

# Initial window size for proper TUI rendering
# Claude Code TUI works best with at least 120 columns
window-width = 160
window-height = 50

# === Shell Integration ===
# Enable shell integration for better responsiveness and text handling
# Shell integration allows complex prompts to resize correctly
shell-integration = detect
shell-integration-features = cursor,title

# === Terminal Compatibility Fix ===
# Fix for Claude Code and Node.js applications hanging
# Ghostty's default TERM=xterm-ghostty isn't recognized by Node.js readline
# This causes applications to hang after displaying headers
# Uncomment the line below if Claude Code or other Node.js apps hang:
term = xterm-256color

# === I/O Performance ===
# Ghostty has dedicated I/O thread, these optimize it
# Reduce confirmation overhead
confirm-close-surface = false

# === macOS Specific ===
# Use native fullscreen for better performance
macos-non-native-fullscreen = false

# Reduce custom titlebar overhead
macos-titlebar-style = native

# === Color Theme: Winter is Coming (Dark Blue) ===
# Based on: https://github.com/johnpapa/vscode-winteriscoming

# Background and Foreground
background = #011627
foreground = #d6deeb

# Cursor
cursor-color = #219fd5

# Selection
selection-background = #103362
selection-foreground = #d6deeb

# ANSI Colors (Normal)
palette = 0=#011627
palette = 1=#ef5350
palette = 2=#5ABEB0
palette = 3=#f7ecb5
palette = 4=#219fd5
palette = 5=#C792EA
palette = 6=#80CBC4
palette = 7=#d6deeb

# ANSI Colors (Bright)
palette = 8=#5f7e97
palette = 9=#ef5350
palette = 10=#5ABEB0
palette = 11=#ffca28
palette = 12=#6dbdfa
palette = 13=#d29ffc
palette = 14=#7fdbca
palette = 15=#ffffff
